definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The Western victors, however, have secured no such advantages.
sentences.chinese: 然而西方的胜利者却无此优势可占。

sentences.english: One thing is certain, which is, that generally after conquerors follow thieves.
sentences.chinese: 有一点却是确实的，就是常有小偷跟在胜利者后面。

sentences.english: The victor would win Toydaria's allegiance.
sentences.chinese: 胜利者将赢得托伊达里亚的忠诚。

sentences.english: A new chapter for Libya, but will the victors stay united?
sentences.chinese: 利比亚翻开了新篇章，但胜利者仍会团结一致吗？

sentences.english: To the victor the less of the spoils the better, should nevertheless be the guideline.
sentences.chinese: 对胜利者来说，战利品越少越好应当作为指导方针。

sentences.english: But there aren’t winners when you completely avoid issues, either.
sentences.chinese: 当然如果你避免争论问题时，同样也没有胜利者。

sentences.english: You see, winners simply do what losers don’t want to do.
sentences.chinese: 要明白，胜利者只是做了失败者不想做的事。

sentences.english: I realize that the world I am describing is the world of the winners.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到我在描述的这个世界是属于胜利者的世界。

sentences.english: History is written by the victors lies.
sentences.chinese: 历史，不过是由胜利者书写的谎言罢了。

sentences.english: The conquered territories were portioned out among the victors.
sentences.chinese: 被征服的领土在胜利者之间被均分了。

sentences.english: The election victor Maithripala Sirisena thanked him.
sentences.chinese: 选举胜利者西里塞纳对此表示感谢。

sentences.english: Yet it's by no means clear that China was the victor.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这绝不意味着中国是这次争端的胜利者。

sentences.english: History is only written for the conquerers.
sentences.chinese: 历史只为胜利者而书写。

sentences.english: The victors, meanwhile, hung on to power long into their dotage.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，胜利者则沉浸于长期的掌权之中。
没有一个胜利者相信机遇。

definition: see 成則為王，敗則為寇|成则为王，败则为寇[cheng2 ze2 wei2 wang2 , bai4 ze2 wei2 kou4]
see 勝者王侯敗者寇|胜者王侯败者寇[sheng4 zhe3 wang2 hou2 bai4 zhe3 kou4]
pinyin: sheng4 zhe3 wang2 hou2 bai4 zhe3 zei2

definition: sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
